data.name: Demolition Robots K.K.
data.detailed_description:
Demolition Robots K.K. is a 4 player giant-robot action game without fighting each other, but by destroying buildings the fastest and most destructive player wins.

This game most attractive part is the special mode for Twitch streaming. Twitch viewers can participate to game which they watching by overlay UI (not using comment, with Twitch Extensions ).
Viewers are placed into the roles of individual residents of the buildings under attack and also allow Twitch viewers to root for and directly troll the actual players by targeting their robots with traps and send a like.

We call it interactive streaming. We thinks that video game culture consumed by many layers of people, not just played directly with controllers.
data.about_the_game:
Demolition Robots K.K. is a 4 player giant-robot action game without fighting each other, but by destroying buildings the fastest and most destructive player wins.

This game most attractive part is the special mode for Twitch streaming. Twitch viewers can participate to game which they watching by overlay UI (not using comment, with Twitch Extensions ).
Viewers are placed into the roles of individual residents of the buildings under attack and also allow Twitch viewers to root for and directly troll the actual players by targeting their robots with traps and send a like.

We call it interactive streaming. We thinks that video game culture consumed by many layers of people, not just played directly with controllers.
data.short_description: A giant-robot action game for up to 4 players, where you earn money not by fighting each other, but by destroying buildings. Also has a special feature where Twitch viewers can participate by overlay UI (not comment ) to impede players.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
